mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_FREEWRITE(POST_ID, POST_READ_COUNT, REPLY_COUNT, USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_FREEWRITE.NEXTVAL, #{postReadCount}, #{replyCount}, #{userId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, F.POST_ID, U.USER_NICKNAME, F.POST_READ_COUNT, F.REPLY_COUNT, F.USER_ID, F.CREATED_DATE, F.UPDATED_DATE FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_FREEWRITE F ON U.ID = F.USER_ID WHERE F.POST_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY
F.POST_ID F.POST_READ_COUNT DESC ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{pagination.startRow} AND #{pagination.endRow}
